meanings.definition: Showing disdain or contempt by ignoring or rejecting someone or something.
meanings.sent1: She gave the snubbiest look to her classmate who tried to talk to her.
meanings.sent2: The popular girl in school was known for her snubbiest behavior towards others.
meanings.sent3: The cat gave the snubbiest stare to the new puppy in the house.
meanings.sent4: The snubbiest cat in the neighborhood acted like she owned the whole street.
meanings.sent5: His snubbiest attitude made it clear he thought he was better than everyone else.

meanings.definition: The most snobbish or haughty in attitude or behavior.
meanings.sent1: She was considered the snubbiest in the group due to her constant bragging.
meanings.sent2: The snubbiest of them all, he looked down on anyone who didn't meet his standards.
meanings.sent3: The snubbiest at the party refused to dance with anyone she deemed unworthy.
meanings.sent4: The snubbiest of the siblings acted as if the world revolved around them.
meanings.sent5: In the world of fashion, she was known as the snubbiest designer, always turning up her nose at others' work.
